properties.description: Represents the data flow, that takes the raw data and does the necessary transformations to clean up the data.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item as string,
		link as string,
		guid as string,
		type as string,
		id as string,
		sponsored as string,
		title as string,
		description as string,
		pubDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	hasComments: true,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> CosmosTransform
RemoveColumns sort(asc(pubDate, true)) ~> SortByArticleID
CosmosTransform derive(sponsored = upper(sponsored)) ~> SetSponsoredBoolean
SetSponsoredBoolean select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns
SortByArticleID alterRow(upsertIf(equals(id,id))) ~> UpsertRowCondition
UpsertRowCondition sink(input(
		article_id as string,
		description as string,
		guid as string,
		item as string,
		link as string,
		pubDate as string,
		source as string,
		sponsored as string,
		title as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/article_id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> ArticlesCleaned
